plays.text: Penalty to Nick Schultz 2 minutes for Tripping Janne Niinimaa

Penalty to Scott Ferguson 2 minutes for Holding Pierre-Marc Bouchard
Goal scored by Mike York assisted by Ryan Smyth and Janne Niinimaa
